function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of Aedes aegypti breeding sites in water containers in dengue-endemic areas","Impact":"Increased risk of dengue transmission","Mitigation":"Distributing larvicidal fish into water containers in dengue-endemic areas","Technologies":"Larvicidal fish distribution system","People":"Residents of dengue-endemic areas","Owner":"Asian Development Bank (ADB) and WHO Western Pacific Region"},{"Description":"Potential transmission of schistosomiasis in China","Impact":"Risk of schistosomiasis infection","Mitigation":"Environmental control interventions, social mobilization, and advocacy for guppy fish distribution system","Technologies":"Guppy fish distribution system, environmental control interventions","People":"Residents of schistosomiasis-endemic areas in China","Owner":"Asian Development Bank (ADB) and WHO Western Pacific Region"}]}
